isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - SLEEPER LIGHTING AND ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Refrigerator Wiring

svcproc.title: Refrigerator Wiring
svcproc.para: With the refrigerator on/off switch in the on position, power flows from battery stud (B2) through circuits 14AX, fuse F10-A, circuit 86AV, refrigerator on/off switch, and circuit 86AG to the refrigerator power source. The ground path is circuits 86-GR, 11-GBD and 11-GBC to ground adapter (454). When the ignition is turned on, power energizes the panel light feed adapter (504) makes available power to circuit 62X going to refrigerator on/off switch. This illuminates the panel lamp LED through ground path 62-GX and 86-GK to panel light ground adapter (506).
